title: God's Grace Is Enough
text: "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness."
devotional: There's something freeing about knowing we don't have to have it all together. Paul wrote these words while wrestling with weakness, and Jesus' response wasn't to remove the pain â€” it was to reveal grace within it. Today, remember that His grace is enough.
prayer: Jesus, thank you for grace. I surrender my weaknesses and trust that your strength will shine through them. Amen.
